## encodeNormalizedFloatToRGBA() function

Encodes a float into a rgba8unorm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function encodeNormalizedFloatToRGBA(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, value: PBShaderExp | number): PBShaderExp;
```
